itunes:title: #140: Your Trauma and Your (Conflictual) Relationship w/ Your Daughter
title: #140: Your Trauma and Your (Conflictual) Relationship w/ Your Daughter
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: If you're a mom and have a conflictual relationship with your daughter, part of it *might* be because your unresolved inner child wounds that resurface when faced with a part of yourself you have not embraced. In this episode we're going to talk about...
itunes:summary:
If you're a mom and have a conflictual relationship with your daughter, part of it *might* be because your unresolved inner child wounds that resurface when faced with a part of yourself you have not embraced.

In this episode we're going to talk about what it may look like along with 9 steps for you to take to work through this.

 

Click here to Join You Are Worthy

Click here to Join The Loved Woman Foundations
